dt: {bc}an aromatic herb ({it}Anthriscus cerefolium{/it}) of the carrot family with divided leaves that are often used in soups and salads

et: Middle English {it}cherville{/it}, from Old English {it}cerfille{/it}, from Latin {it}caerefolium{/it}, modification of Greek {it}*chairephyllon{/it}, from {it}chairein{/it} to rejoice + {it}phyllon{/it} leaf {ma}{mat|yearn|}, {mat|blade|}{/ma}
shortdef: an aromatic herb (Anthriscus cerefolium) of the carrot family with divided leaves that are often used in soups and salads; also : any of several related plants
